column5: Hi Guys, Need to replace the diaphram on my Jiffy carb. I live in Hamilton - work in Mississauga. Does anyone know where I can get one?  Thanks,  Mark
Any small engine shop should have them in stock, it is either a Zama or Walboro carb. Take the old diaphram with you so they can match it up properly.
No problem! If you do have any problem finding one just send me a picture of yours, I might have one in stock here and could get it down to you if necessary.
